article_node.title: A 'West Marches-style' game could make for Critical Role's most interesting campaign yet
article_node.summary: Critical Role has announced its fourth campaign, set to launch on October 2, 2025, featuring a West Marches-style format with 13 players divided into three groups. Game Master Brennan Lee Mulligan will lead the campaign, marking a shift from Matt Mercer, who will join as a full-time player. The West Marches approach emphasizes player agency and exploration in a sandbox environment, allowing the world to evolve based on player discoveries, which will be crucial in the new setting of Aram√°n.
